arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid squad list to face CA Osasuna | La Liga MD1
arts.sum: Real Madrid will kick off their 2025/26 La Liga campaign on Tuesday night when they host CA Osasuna at the Santiago Bernabeu. It will mark the first La Liga in charge for manager Xabi Alonso, who took over the reins of the team in June and led them to the FIFA Club World Cup semi-finals. arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Pre-Match Press Conference Ahead of Real Madrid vs Osasuna in La Liga
arts.sum: Alonso: I'm clear that it's a very good competition and I really like that in each position we have two players who can play, who want to show they deserve the place. We want to step foot in the Bernabéu; for some it will be for the first time, and the team and fans' desire will come together.

arts.ttl: Alonso talks Vinicius, Mbappe, Rodrygo, Mastantuono, Lamine Yamal, Barcelona ahead of Real Madrid vs Osasuna
arts.sum: The time has come for Xabi Alonso to make his La Liga managerial debut as he gets set to lead Real Madrid in their first game of the 2025/26 season against Osasuna on Tuesday. arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Osasuna: Predicted Lineup for La Liga Clash
arts.sum: Trent Alexander-Arnold and Dean Huijsen have already made their competitive debuts in the Club World Cup. Álvaro Carreras and Franco Mastantuono will be hoping they can see the field, with the latter likely being a substitute if he makes the bench. It will be the first game at the Santiago Bernabeu as the Real Madrid head coach, and he has plenty of decisions to be made regarding the starting lineup.
